analysis_sexuality: Using "he/she" in job descriptions can introduce gender bias by excluding non-binary individuals and implying a binary gender preference, making it more inclusive to use gender-neutral terms like "they" or "the candidate."
text: 1 to 3 years sales experience. Sound knowledge of the terrain. He/she must be able to drive manual vehicle with a valid driving license. computer skills. communication skills. slot: 10 (PH, Awka, Owerri, Aba, Otukpo, Calabar, Benin, Ekpoma, Uyo and Aba).
